column4: I got a little script issue: What would the expected outcome of this do: if [-f /etc/skel/.profile.old]
you need a space like so:  [ -f ..... .old  ]
and 1lutz THANKS.. I made a script which lets me pick a location of our schools and based on userinput from 1-9 it creates your bookmarks to accomodate the windows common shares
